context_of_use: This use case allows users to download reports for offline analysis and record keeping.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to analyze data offline
user: wants to analyze data offline
description: Allow users to download reports for offline analysis and record keeping.
triggering_event: User requests to download a report.
postconditions: User can access the report offline
assumptions: Users have the necessary permissions to download reports
requirements_met: The system shall allow users to download reports for offline analysis.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the types of reports available for download.
main_flow: 1. customer/user requests to download a report → System processes the request.
2. System verifies user permissions → System confirms permissions are valid.
3. System prepares the report for download → System generates the report file.
4. System provides the download link → User receives the download link.
5. User downloads the report → System confirms the download is successful.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the user is not authenticated, then the system prompts the user to log in.
